amendment.description: Pursuant to the provisions of H.Res. 352, an amendment in the nature of a substitute consisting of Rules Committee print 115-19 shall be considered as adopted and the bill, as amended, shall be considered as read.
amendment.purpose: Pursuant to the provisions of H.Res. 352, an amendment in the nature of a substitute consisting of Rules Committee print 115-19 shall be considered as adopted and the bill, as amended, shall be considered as read.
